messages: b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (00:51): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e: metadiscussion of off-topic topics seems unlikely to be more on topic than the topic it concerns
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (00:53): b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea: what topic are you talking about?
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (00:53): is it the article about the two different html5 specs?
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (00:55): (w3 and whatwg)
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (00:57): b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb: There was some (meta) discussion on the WHATWG list about some CNN atricle about HTML5
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (00:57): Or Cnet or someone
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (00:57): CNet seems more likely
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (00:57): thats what I was saying :)
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (00:58): its more about the differences between the drafts and drama IMO
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (00:58): Well then it appears I am unwittingly agreeing with you
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (00:58): but it is offtopic
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (00:58): b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb: For the list, I would say so
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (00:58): Although 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e is the arbiter
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (00:58): (is that a real word?)
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (00:59): I tend to ignore discussions like that just because it attracts flaming sometimes
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (00:59): so far it has remained low-volume enough that i'm letting it pass
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (01:00): (shutting down discussions about my being a dictator is more likely to cause drama than letting a low-level discussion occur)
4b5f96b5acaa36dc96cebf4c5a1598dd (01:00): Keep up the good work is all I can say.
4b5f96b5acaa36dc96cebf4c5a1598dd (01:01): How can anybody not agree that this is the most exciting time for web development there has been.
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (01:01): Yeah I wasn't really suggesting you shut it down
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:01): well ignoring those kind of things is the best way of keeping the drama down
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (01:01): Just complaining :)
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:01): its a big problem for public mailing lists sometimes
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:06): its interesting that http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml is the most linked page on this channel
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:07): was just looking at the stats
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (01:07): b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb: that's the xhtml5 namespace
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (01:07): so it makes sense
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:07): true
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:12): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e: what happens after HTML5 is finalised? Do we start talking HTML6?
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (01:14): in the whatwg we've already moved on from html5 -- if you look at the spec you'll see it talks about "HTML", not "HTML5"
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (01:14): as or in the w3c, i dunno
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:15): :)
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:15): Oh didnt notice the change
cc7bcfbc58c467939c5987584fc882cb (01:19): html 7 ex plus alpha turbo championship edition
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:20): cc7bcfbc58c467939c5987584fc882cb: lol
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:27): hmmmm is the "the" supposed to be behind the "web" in "web hypertext application technology" on this page http://www.whatwg.org/specs/
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (01:27): yes
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:28): ah ok so its not a bug its a feature
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (01:28): my styling abilities leave a lot to be desired for :-)
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:28): well my style isnt any better http://shanefagan.com
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:28): :D
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:30): at least used some HTML5 on one of his posts
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:33): just the video tag though I wordpress butchered my attempt at using <canvas>
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:34): just the video tag though I wordpress butchered my attempt at using <canvas>
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:35): I have played with it on a test website though so fun but I cant draw for the life of me
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:35): canvas is awesome though
b2cba13dca9931fada92f4cf76a5ffbb (01:35): high fives whoever had the idea
